column4: Is it possible to clear the console screen of all boot messages, when the login prompt is displayed on Ubuntu 8.04 Server?
i think you have to edit /etc/issue and add a clear command there
well... not a clear command, there is a way to do it in there though
i know it's from gentoo docs but this will work: http://gentoo-wiki.com/SECURITY_Clear_screen_on_logout
